room_title: Escape room "The Retreat" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: We did the Retreat for a bachelorette party - it was amazing! So much fun. Nick was our guide - he was awesome. We'll definitely be back to do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Retreat" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: Had a great time! Staff (Amelia, Samantha) made it really fun and we're welcoming. If you are comfortable not sleeping for a week (scary!) but want a great challenge, check out The Retreat. We escaped! :)

room_title: Escape room "The Retreat" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: Great experience at this escape game and Samantha was great! One of the best escape games we've played and a perfect mix of puzzles and props. We played The Retreat and found the difficulty just right. Highly recommend Trapology.

room_title: Escape room "The Retreat" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: I have played a few hundred games all over the world and really enjoyed Trapology. We played the Retreat with a 2-player team. It was on the easy side as far as puzzles go, but still enough to keep it fun and fast-paced. The location was very nice and the staff were friendly and fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Retreat" by Trapology Boston in Boston
review: We had a great time and solved The Retreat! Samantha was super!
